com.castlabs.android.player

Interface PlayerViewPlugin.PlayerViewComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SubtitlesViewComponent
    Enclosing interface:
    PlayerViewPlugin

    public static interface PlayerViewPlugin.PlayerViewComponent
    Implementations of this view component can be used to gain controlled access to a IPlayerView and its PlayerController.

    The component can use the IPlayerView or its PlayerController to add event listeners and get callbacks during the playback lifecycle.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PlayerViewPlugin.PlayerViewComponent.ComponentView
      Class container holding the view and the data on how the view should be related to its parent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlayerViewPlugin.PlayerViewComponent.ComponentView componentView() 
      java.lang.Class id()
      Returns the class that is used to identify this component when it is registered with the player view.
      void onPlayerControllerConnected(IPlayerView playerView)
      This method is called when the hosting IPlayerView instance creates or receives a PlayerController instance.
      void onPlayerControllerDisconnected(IPlayerView playerView)
      This method is called when the hosting IPlayerView looses the PlayerController and the controller is disposed or put into background.

    • Method Detail

      • id

        @Nullable
java.lang.Class id()
        Returns the class that is used to identify this component when it is registered with the player view. This is what you need to pass to PlayerView.getComponent(Class) to get the registered instance of this component.
        Returns:
        The class that identifies this component.

      • componentView

        @Nullable
PlayerViewPlugin.PlayerViewComponent.ComponentView componentView()
        Returns:
        The PlayerViewPlugin.PlayerViewComponent.ComponentView which will be attached to the IPlayerView

      • onPlayerControllerConnected

        void onPlayerControllerConnected(@NonNull
                                 IPlayerView playerView)
        This method is called when the hosting IPlayerView instance creates or receives a PlayerController instance.

        You can use this method to add listeners to the controller. If you do add listeners, ensure the the listener is removed in onPlayerControllerDisconnected(IPlayerView)

        Parameters:
        playerView - The player view. The views controller is already set and initialized

      • onPlayerControllerDisconnected

        void onPlayerControllerDisconnected(@NonNull
                                    IPlayerView playerView)
        This method is called when the hosting IPlayerView looses the PlayerController and the controller is disposed or put into background. You can use PlayerController.isBackgrounded() to find out if the controller was moved do background or if it was fully disposed.

        Components that add listeners to when the player controller is connected need to remove any listener that they added from the controller.

        Parameters:
        playerView - The player view.
